node1.PC_Text: Oh. Em. Gee. Fran, come look at these adorable puppies I found on the internet!
So who was that cute guy I saw you sitting with at lunch?
node1.NPC_Response: His name is Paolo, he's down in accounting.

node1.PC_Text: Hey there friend! How did your appointment this morning with the dermotologist go?

A.PC_Text: I wish I could adopt every one of them.
A.NPC_Response: Pet overpopulation is a big problem. Maybe you could volunteer at the animal shelter?

A.PC_Text: My dream is to get rich and open a puppy sanctuary where I can rescue all the puppies.
A.NPC_Response: Pet overpopulation is a big problem.  Maybe you could volunteer, for now?

A.PC_Text: I had a puppy like this one when I was little. She was my only friend in the whole world and I loved her so much I have her ashes on my mantle at home.

B.PC_Text: Looked like you guys were having a great conversation.
B.NPC_Response: We were talking about a project we're collaborating on.
I'm sure he has lots of friends.

C.PC_Text: Was he able to figure out what the problem was?
Did the doc examine that... thing on your rear?
C.NPC_Response: Yes, Annie, if you must know! Can you keep your voice down at least?

C.PC_Text: What did the doctor say about that giant rash on your butt?
C.NPC_Response: Can we not talk about this at work?!

AA.PC_Text: Maybe I'll win volunteer of the month on my first day!
I'll sneak all the animals home with me so they can sleep in my bed.
AA.NPC_Response: I don't think that's a very good idea.

AB.PC_Text: But I need to be with all the puppies day and night!
AB.NPC_Response: Why don't you start with volunteering and work up to that?

AB.PC_Text: You're right. We should start our own shelter together and quit these pointless jobs!
AB.NPC_Response: Um, I did not say that.

AC.PC_Text: She got old and we had to put her down.
We had to put her down, but I got to push the incinerator button.
We had to put her down. We took her body home and cremated her in the firepit. Ooh, I have a craving for smores!

BA.NPC_Response: Yeah, I think it's going to be really great.

BA.PC_Text: That's how it starts, you know. First comes collaboration then comes first date...
I slipped my phone number into phone when he wasn't looking!

BB.PC_Text: Well, he seems like a nice guy.
No, I meant does he have a friend as cute as him that I can have lunch with!
Could you get me a few of their phone numbers? We could double date!

BC.PC_Text: Oh, I've been there. They have great chocolate.
Nice! That's a great place to raise kids.
BC.NPC_Response: Why are you talking about raising kids!?

BC.PC_Text: No, with that tan… I mean, where is he really from?

CA.PC_Text: Did he give you some medication?
CA.NPC_Response: No, just recommended some over-the-counter cream.

CA.PC_Text: I had a cousin with something similar. He died.
CA.NPC_Response: Why would you even say that?

CB.PC_Text: Did he say what it was?
I did some internet image searches to find a match. The closest match I saw was some kind of hives...
CB.NPC_Response: It's nothing to concern yourself with. Also Annie, that's really weird.

CC.PC_Text: Sure, of course. I didn't mean to embarrass you.
CC.NPC_Response: I just want to keep my personal life personal, you know?

CC.PC_Text: I had a rash like that once. It itched like crazy. Some kind of fungus thing.
CC.NPC_Response: I do not have a fungal infection, but thanks for the concern.

CC.PC_Text: What kind of medication did he prescribe? Do you need help applying it?
CC.NPC_Response: For goodness sakes Annie, no! I can manage.
